III. Installation and Setup

1. Installation Steps

Windows Platform The XenseStudio.exe installer is provided. Double-click the file and follow the on-screen prompts to complete the installation. After installation, a shortcut named “Xense Studio” will be displayed on the desktop.

Linux Platform The xensestudio.deb installer is provided. Use the sudo command to install it:

sudo dpkg -i /path/to/your/XenseStudio_v1.1.4.deb
Install XenseStudio

2. Initial Configuration

After the program starts, the software interface will be displayed as shown in Figure 1:
